title: Muse: A tool for working with email archives
description: Muse is a research tool from Stanford University for browsing large-scale email archives and is still under development. It is designed to help journalists, archivists, and researchers browse email archives and to aid in the discovery of patterns and insights. Muse can automatically create summaries of messages, group people who frequently communicate with each other, perform sentiment analysis, view attachments and browse messages quickly by turning facets on and off.
